composition.Programmer 1: Test whether the website can be accessed through local port 5000. In this test, you only need to test whether the login page of the website can be accessed through the local 5000 port.
composition.Programmer 2: Test whether the first page of the website is the login page and whether it can log in correctly based on the example data provided in the Task.
composition.Programmer 3:
Test the elements and integrity of ALL pages. This includes checking the following elements for each page 
- **Login Page**  Check for the presence of username input field (ID  `usernameInput`), password input field (ID  `passwordInput`), login button (ID  `loginButton`), and register button (ID  `registerButton`).
- **Register Page**  Check for the presence of username input field (ID  `usernameInput`), password input field (ID  `passwordInput`), and register button (ID  `registerButton`).
- **Dashboard Page**  Check for the presence of welcome message (ID  `welcomeMessage`), featured skills section (ID  `featuredSkillsSection`), view all skills button (ID  `viewAllSkillsButton`), about SkillShare button (ID  `aboutButton`), and profile link (ID  `profileLink`).
- **Skills Page**  Check for the presence of skills list (ID  `skillsList`), add skill input (ID  `newSkillInput`), add skill button (ID  `addSkillButton`), and remove skill button (ID  `removeSkillButton`).
- **Profile Page**  Check for the presence of name field (ID  `usernameInput`) and save changes button (ID  `saveChangesButton`).
- **About Page**  Check for the presence of about section (ID  `aboutSection`) and contact information (ID  `contactInfo`).
